heading: HR00977
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO IMMEDIATELY CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE IMPACTS OF THE IMPORTATION, USE, AND SALE OF HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP IN THE PHILIPPINES ON THE SUSTAINABILITY OF THE LOCAL SUGAR INDUSTRY, AS WELL AS ON THE HEALTH OF FILIPINO CONSUMERS
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2017-05-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00977
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO IMMEDIATELY CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE IMPACTS OF THE IMPORTATION, USE, AND SALE OF HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP IN THE PHILIPPINES ON THE SUSTAINABILITY OF THE LOCAL SUGAR INDUSTRY, AS WELL AS ON THE HEALTH OF FILIPINO CONSUMERS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-08
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2017-05-24
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-05-15;
